hypothesis: Visit-saturation penalty + exploration mode in dispatch_optimizer.py reduces score concentration and promotes undervisited domains
method: Added two mechanisms to dispatch_optimizer.py: (1) visit saturation penalty = 1.5 * ln(1 + visit_count) that applies diminishing returns for repeatedly visiting same domains, (2) exploration mode triggered when visit Gini > 0.45 that boosts unvisited (+8.0) and dormant (+4.0) domains
verdict: CONFIRMED: visit saturation + exploration mode reduce score concentration 36% and promote unvisited domains to top-3. F-ECO5 coverage-weighted scoring mechanism working.
next: Measure domain coverage after 10 dispatch sessions with new scoring. If coverage rises from 69% toward 88% baseline, RESOLVE F-ECO5. If Gini continues >0.45, tune saturation scale.
